title: Calories in a Shrimp Tempura Roll
meta_description: Learn calories in shrimp tempura roll, with full nutrition breakdown including carbs, protein, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Shrimp Tempura Roll
assumptions: Standard 8-piece sushi roll with tempura-fried shrimp, sushi rice, nori, cucumber, and avocado; no extra sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, frying oil, rice amount, and added ingredients. Check menus or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One shrimp tempura roll has about 450 kcal, with high carbs from rice and moderate fat from tempura.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use steamed shrimp instead of tempura

faqs.q: How many calories in shrimp tempura roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 450 kcal for a standard 8-piece roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a shrimp tempura roll?
faqs.a: About 62 g carbs, mostly from sushi rice.

faqs.q: Is shrimp tempura roll high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 850 mg due to soy sauce and seasoning in rice.

faqs.q: How much protein in one shrimp tempura roll?
faqs.a: Roughly 14 g protein from the shrimp and rice.

faqs.q: Can I make shrimp tempura roll lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, skip the tempura batter and frying to reduce by about 100 kcal.
